Text: RE Assignors Obligations Due Diligencemorning Further to Steves comments below I am also wondering what the new language in the Assignment of Interests adds or is intended to add beyond the language in the prior paragraph Are there obligations of VLDC outside the Haywood LLC that are intended to be assigned by the new language If so then as Steve suggests we need to make sure that AES knows what the universe includes and gets related reps and warranties The reps and warranties under the SPA reach only to the obligations of Haywood Thanks Audrey Original Message From Steve Hase mailto Sent Thursday May AM To Subject Assignors Obligations Due Dligence Ben and Aaron We note in the Assignment of Interest document sent yesterday there is a new section whereby AES would be assuming all of the obligations of Volunter Land Development Company We need to perform due diligence on what those obligations are and whether they have changed since the SPA was executed We need the following information for determining what obligations VLDC has incurred financial statements of the LLC What debts does the LLC owe and to whom list of all the agreements entered into by the company to my knowledge there is the system impact study agreemt with TVA Any other agreements with TVA like a Keep Whole letter copies of any new agreements not already delivered in the Binder dated Nov any tax agreements with the County or any other public entity any amendments to your land option agreements with Mann or English Id appreciate your review of these matters as soon as possible to keep our scheduled closing on track Ill be meeting with Ben at CT Our call remains at PM CT same as before Steve Hase

Closing Documents Executed by AES Greystone LLC Cc with the closing today under the Securities Purchase Agreement attached please find the following documents each as executed by an authorized representative of AES Greystone LLC Assignment of Interest in Haywood Power I LLC Amendment No to Securities Purchase Agreement Amendment No to Project Development Agreement Certificate of AES Greystone LLC Notice of Waiver of Termination Option and Commitment Letter We will send one original signature page for each of these documents to Aaron Roffwarg at Bracewell Patterson on Tuesday of next week Many thanks to all Have a great weekend Regards Audrey Amendment No pdfpdf Representations Certificatepdf Notice of Waiver of Termination Optionpdf Commitment Letterpdf Assignment of Interestpdf Amendment No pdf
